about_content:
This is a tool based on Strictura and make improvement.
It's open soucre under MIT License and images made by it(not vanilla) are under CC BY 4.0 License(https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/).

Open source address: https://github.com/MioMiko/StructuraImproved
Orignal Structura address: https://github.com/RavinMaddHatter/Structura

StructuraImproved Lisence original text:

{}

Structura Lisence original text:

{}
info_save_path: Save path of info such as Name tags and material list
help_summary:
Use double quotes to input an empty string or string with spaces

Commands:
  help [command]: show this help and if commands are followed,it will show details of the command.
  add <name_tag> [options]: Add a model.
  modify <name_tag> [options]: modify details of a model.
  del <name_tag>: delete a model.
  clear: clear all models.
  list: list all the model exist.
  set <option_name> <value>: set options of the pack.
  make: start making the pack.
  load <file_path>: read commands from a text file.
  quit: exit this tool.
help_add:
add <name_tag> [options]
Add a model.
options:
  -s <mcstructure_file_path>: add a structure to the model.
  -o <x_offset> <y_offset> <z_offset>: set the offset of the model.
  -a <transparency:an integer from 0 to 100>: set the transparency of the model.
help_modify:
modify <name_tag> [options]
Modify details of a model.
options:
  -s <mcstructure_file_path>: modify a structure of the model.
  -o <x_offset> <y_offset> <z_offset>: modify the offset of the model.
  -a <transparency:an integer from 0 to 100>: modify the transparency of the model.
help_list:
list
List all the model exist.
help_set:
set <option_name> <value>
Set options of the pack.
option_names:
  packname: value:string. Set the pack name.
  makelist: value:true/false. Make a material list or not.
  icon: value:string(image_file_path). Set an icon for the pack
help_load:
load <file_path>
Read commands from a text file.
